    • Method Detail

      • handle

        public void handle(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent event)
        Handles all key press events. If W is pressed, the player moves forward. If S is pressed player moves backwards. A and D move the player from side to side. F turns light on and off. Left and right movement keys move the camera either left or right. Space moves the player above the map. The Esc key pauses the game.
        Specified by:
        handle in interface javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent>
        Parameters:
        event - The key press event.
